articles.description: There was a total of 308,630 complaints against banks in the FY as against 195,901 a year earlier.With NBFCs, the higher number of complaints were about non-adherence to the FPC (36.29%), followed by non-observance of RBI’s directions (18.56%)
articles.content: The number of complaints against banks and non-banking financial institutions (NBFCs) with Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is on the rise.According to RBIs annual report on Banking Ombudsman Scheme, the … [+1895 chars]

articles.title: Airtel and Jio Disney+ Hotstar VIP users can now upgrade to premium subscription, here is now - India Today
articles.description: Airtel and Jio users with VIP subscription to Disney+ Hotstar can now upgrade to a Premium subscription by logging into Dinsey+ Hotstar and tapping on 'Upgrade.'

articles.title: HCL Technologies Employees To Receive Ten Days' Salary As Special Bonus - NDTV Profit
articles.description: HCL Technologies on Monday announced that its employees across the world, with service of one year or more, will receive special bonus equivalent to ten days' salary.
articles.content:
HCL Technologies will pay special bonus to employees in February 2021.

articles.title: Adani Enterprises shares hit new 52-week high after arm picks up 23.5% stake in Mumbai International... - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Adani Airport Holdings, a wholly owned subsidiary of Adani Enterprises, has acquired 23.5 percent stake in Mumbai International Airport from ACSA Global and Bid Services Division (Mauritius) for Rs 1,685.25 crore, the company said.
articles.content:
Adani Enterprises share price gained 5 percent intraday on February 8 after the company's arm Adani Airports acquired stake in Mumbai International Airport.

articles.title: Airtel to shutdown copper network; to offer only fiber broadband: Gopal Vittal - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Bharti Airtel said that it will shutdown down its copper infrastructure in a year's time and will just offer Fiber-to-the Home in the country.
